attributes.action: Call for a review of "Section 333 of the Communications Act 2003" to consider regulation and qualification criteria for televised election debates.
attributes.additional_details:
"Section 333 of the Communications Act 2003" was enacted by Government in 2003 before any televised election debates had ever taken place.

I believe this Act is now outdated and needs revision to include regulation of televised election debates, and thier criteria for participation, et cetera.

Please sign the petition if you agree.
